  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x579
      LayoutBlockFlow {PRE} at (0,0) size 784x48
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 8x16
          text run at (0,0) width 8: "1"
        LayoutBR {BR} at (8,12) size 0x0
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,16) size 8x32
          text run at (0,16) width 0: " "
          text run at (0,32) width 8: "2"
